title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: The ImageAnalyzer example displays scrollbars even when the content does not overflow the available space.
EB: Scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example when the content does not overflow the available space.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Ensure that the content does not overflow the available space.
3. Observe that scrollbars are still visible even when they are not required.
